data.name: Append each other
data.description:
# Description:

Connect each String from the inner list with the next String of the next inner list.
Continue until all inner lists are processed.

Return the result as a sorted list in ascending order.

If a list is not a correct list or is empty, return null.

The tests include only null tests, empty checks as well as strings.

Try to solve the task iterative if possible.

# Examples: 

Imagine the following list with inner lists as passing parameters and on the right side the expected result:
``` java 
[["a1","a2"],["b1","b2"]] => ["a1b1", "a1b2", "a2b1", "a2b2"]
```
or
``` java
[["a1","a2"],["b1"],["c1"]] => ["a1b1c1", "a2b1c1"]
```
or
``` java
[["a1",null],["b1"],["c1"]] => null
```
